@IrishTimes Other angles to issue of teacher shortages. Ireland part of global market in teachers. better pay, conditions + promotion prospects attract young Irish teachers to teach abroad. not just issue of training but of retaining. also need to train / hire eligible migrants / refugees.

@PaudieCoffey @FrankFeighan Appears to be very good news - historic low rate of youth unemployment - in Waterford. important to understand why - new local economy? new rules for eligibility for job seeker payment? new definitions for record keeping? any other suggestions? would welcome all thoughts on this.
